a Psy-field (psychic interference causing mental damage. Prolonged unprotected exposure results in hallucinations and eventually zombification.).

a Psy-field caused by the Brain Scorcher (psychic interference causing mental damage. Prolonged exposure without a psi-helmet results in hallucinations and eventually zombification.).
a Vortex anomaly (gravitational whirlwind pulling objects inward).
a Comet anomaly (mobile fireball causing severe burn damage).
a Pulse anomaly (pulsating energy field).
a Teleport anomaly (spatial distortion causing displacement).
a Burnt Fuzz anomaly (resembles moss or vines, hanging down like curtains from its growing spot. Relatively harmless, but can damage unarmored stalkers upon contact.).
a Tesla anomaly (mobile ball of electricity).
a Space anomaly (spatial distortion).
a Space anomaly (spatial distortion).
a Space anomaly (spatial distortion).
a Cognitive Dissonance Field anomaly (a highly localized breach in the fabric of the Noosphere, causing psychic damage. Prolonged exposure can lead to hallucinations and eventually zombification).
an Umbral Cluster anomaly (a swarm of shadow-like entities that move in unison, creating an eerie and unsettling atmosphere. Causes psychic damage).
a Flash anomaly (a tear in the space-time continuum that disrupts the fabric of the universe itself).
a Ghost anomaly (a puff of smoky, ethereal substance that moves with seemingly sentient purpose. Touching it can lead to electrocution or disintegration).
a Liquid Gold anomaly (a cloud of golden orange colored toxic chemical substance).
a Thorn anomaly (a small, unremarkable patch on the ground that when set off rapidly expands into jagged spiky thorns in all directions).
a Seed anomaly (a highly radioactive cloud of tiny particles that seem to multiply when agitated).
a Shatterpoint anomaly (a cluster of glass-like shards tied to a central point and suspended in the air).
a Sloth anomaly (a highly dangerous chemical anomaly).

a Mefistotel anomaly (a strange flower-like formation, with delicate tendrils that emit an eerie sound when any living organism approaches. It looks like an artifact, but pulls in and shreds any stalker who approaches too closely).
a Net anomaly (a cloud of charged particles trapping anyone that touches it).
a Point anomaly (crystalline orb charged with electric energy).
a Rebounder anomaly (a gravitational anomaly altering the trajectory of moving objects that enter it).
